name: Particle Playground
description:
Just a simple little toy/game i made in an afternoon. Not much else to see here.

All mouse controls; Click the + to add a new type of particle, click the particle button to set the particle count, friction, and push/pull on other particles. WASD to move the camera around.

Music is Bodhi Ambient by Daniel Birch: Free Music Archive - Daniel Birch - Bodhi Ambient
